meanings.definition: A railway system in which the track consists of a single rail.
meanings.sent1: The monorail glided smoothly along the single rail.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy riding the monorail to get around the city.
meanings.sent3: The monorail driver waved at the passengers with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: The monorail was a lone traveler on the metal path.
meanings.sent5: The futuristic monorail looked like a silver snake in the sky.

meanings.definition: A vehicle or train that runs on a monorail track.
meanings.sent1: The monorail carried passengers swiftly on its track.
meanings.sent2: The monorail operator announced the next stop over the speakers.
meanings.sent3: The monorail seemed to dance along the elevated rail.
meanings.sent4: The monorail moved like a silent giant through the city.
meanings.sent5: The monorail hummed softly as it transported commuters.
